====== cleanCache ======

| {{http://api.joomla.org/media/images/package.png?nolink}} [[references:joomla.framework|Joomla.Framework]] | {{http://api.joomla.org/media/images/package.png?nolink}} [[references:joomla.framework/#Cache|Cache]] | {{http://api.joomla.org/media/images/Class.png?nolink}}[[JCache|JCache]] | [[http://api.joomla.org/Joomla-Framework/Cache/JCache.html#cleanCache|JCache->cleanCache]] | Never | Public review |

Cleans the cache.

===== Syntax =====
void cleanCache	( **$group**, **$mode** )
| **$group** | mixed | is a string containing the cache group. This parameter is optional and if omitted defaults to false. |
| **$mode** | mixed | is a string containing the mode to use. This paramter is optional and if omitted defaults to 'ingroup'. |

===== Examples =====
<code php|Example>
global $mainframe;

$cache =& JFactory::getCache();
$cache->cleanCache();
</code>
